channel.title: Raven Hunt Blog
channel.description: A blog where music, emotions, and storytelling intersect. Welcome to the world of Raven Hunt.

item.title: Welcome to the World of Raven Hunt
item.description: Raven Hunt welcomes you to the world of music, emotions, and storytelling. Explore the vision behind the music and join the community.

item.title: "Built to Love You" is Finally Out
item.description: The long awaited track Built to Love You is finally out in your favorite music platforms.

item.title: Why Sad Songs Heal Us More Than Happy Songs
item.description: Why do sad songs comfort us more than happy ones? Here's how and why emotional music heals heartbreak, loneliness, and heavy feelings.
